title: Wild Card Red Challenge Flag Picks & the dysfunctional Steelers
itunes:title: Wild Card Red Challenge Flag Picks & the dysfunctional Steelers
description:
Dave Dameshek is joined by Handsome Hank and Matt "Money" Smith to make their Wild Card round Red Challenge Flag Picks! Money reads an Eddie Spaghetti Tweet (14:05) which leads to the group trying to guess Shek's weight after the holidays (18:05). Next, Shek, Money and Hank get into the Antonio Brown situation and who is to blame in Pittsburgh (21:00)? The trio rounds out the show with their Wild Card weekend Red Challenge Flag Picks (31:26).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
